name: Defining Latex Shaper (long)
description:
Regular Price $65.00

DUE TO THE HIGH DEMAND, PROCESSING COULD TAKE 5-10 BUSINESS DAYS DUE TO MANUFACTURING & PRODUCTION. PRODUCT COMES DIRECTLY FROM COLOMBIA!!!

IMPORTANT: PLEASE ORDER ACCORDING TO THE SIZE CHART. THIS PRODUCT DOES NOT USE TRADITIONAL SIZING SUCH AS CLOTHING SIZE OR WAIST SIZE!!!

This shaper can be worn for everyday use. Simply wrap the shaper around your midsection. This creates compression in your core, stimulating thermal activity and increasing perspiration, which is key for weight loss. This process allows impurities and toxins to exit the body, while mobilizing fat cells.

Features
•	Latex Band
•	Hook & Eye Closure
•	2 rows of hooks 
•	Flexi-boning (prevents garment from rolling up)
Benefits
•	Loss of inches in waist & abdomen 
•	Stimulates perspiration through increased thermal activity
•	Corrects posture
•	Back support & breast enhancement
•	Maximum abdominal compression to reduce waist and flatten your abdomen
•	Exerts pressure on the torso shaping loose skin and sculpting the figure
•	Ideal everyday use

name: Hcg Drops w/ B12
description:
30 or 60 day supply of drops includes Dr. Simeon's HCG Guide

The HCG or (Human Chorionic Gonadotripin) diet has been called the #1 diet in America, and is continually gaining popularity in other countries. It was created by Dr. Simeon's in the late 1950's and is promoted by thousands of the highest regarded doctors nationwide. This amazing weight loss system was featured on Dr. Oz. with users reporting weight loss ranging from half a pound to 3lbs daily (when combined with a healthy low calorie diet).

QUICK AND EASY WEIGHT LOSS
1) Take the drops. 
2) Follow the diet. 
3) WATCH THE FAT MELT OFF! 
Thousands of men and women have already achieved incredible results with the HCG Diet! Many of our customers have reported losing over 1 pound per day.

name: Garcinia Cambogia
description:
"Sale price is for a limited time only"
Reg. Price $60.00 
60 capsules

SCG Garcinia Cambogia blocks the enzyme that converts sugar into fat, increases your metabolism and suppresses your appetite creating an exceptionally effective weight loss supplement.

BENEFITS OF GARCINIA CAMBOGIA: 
- Blocks Fat Production 
- Suppresses Appetite 
- Increases your Serotonin Levels 
- Includes HCA (Hydroxycitric Acid) 
- All Natural Weight Loss 
- No Side Effects

DR OZ TALKED ABOUT GARCINIA CAMBOGIA ON HIS SHOW OCT 28, 2012: 
- "NO Diet, NO Exercise, NO Effort" 
- "Newest, fastest revolutionary fat buster" 
- "The most exciting breakthrough in natural weight loss to date" 
- "The magic ingredient that lets you lose weight without diet or exercise" 
- "The simple solution you have been looking for to bust your fat for good"
